website_summaries.verdict: Nice price for a powerful 1,000-watt amplifier. It's larger than some other options, but it delivers excellent performance.
pros: Includes all of the features you'd expect to find in a high-end Kenwood amplifier, such as a variable low-pass filter, a bass boost, and pre-amp inputs
Delivers a premium level of clean sound with 1,000 watts of power
Larger than some other models, but still fits most installations
cons: May require an extra cost to have it installed by a professional

customer_reviews.title: Was very skeptical but purchased it anyway
customer_reviews.text: Received the amp and hooked it up within 10 minutes after receiving. I removed one amp to hook up another. It powered right up but no power to the subs. Wow, so I trouble shoot just like an idiot because I thought maybe it was me. Pull apart dash, pull out stereo, trace wires and everything is very wired correctly. Put everything back together. Try the kenwood amp again and power but no sound. Hook back up the old amp and magic I have bass. This amp is being returned for sure. I was thinking of trying another but no no no I will spend my money on another brand entirely....
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Picked up this unit for the price and I like and had good luck with Kenwood amps in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this unit for the price and I like and had good luck with Kenwood amps in the past. Currently driving 2 old 10in Kenwood subs rated around 250 watts a piece. So this amp is a bit over kill. No pops and crackles, just installed and works as it should. After some tuning the amp never gets hot, maybe warm but not hot. Very pleased. Being a class D its pretty efficient and when driving the subs hard no major draw off the vehicles system . Deck is also a Kenwood 99 Ford exploder with sealed box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great power! Easy to install because of its size. I purchased a 500 watt RMS Kicker and it was a perfect match. I highly recommend the combination. If you have a truck and want a shallow sized Kicker, those speakers are called “Kicker RT”. They fit a lot better than the regular “Kicker Comp R” editions. The “Kicker RT” speakers are almost double the price but they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: BOOM!!
customer_reviews.text: This drives my 2x Memphis Mojo 12"s GREAT! And they are rated 2000W each! This was a replacement for same model I bought 2 years prior though that shorted out even with too preventive fuses on unit. When connected to only one of my Mojos, Ppl think they are about to die or any glass around has imminent shattering lol, AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hackworth

customer_reviews.title: Great amp for the size and money
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the size fool you, this amp works great all day putting out 500 rms at 2 ohms and never gets hot. Pushing my KICKER 12"S is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: No questions
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered this same modal in the pic. But never got that amp. I received a exion 1000watt amp in the place of it. So becarefull before u buy check all stock first
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2-3 years, forgot it in my car when I traded it in and regret not taking it out, great value and never had any problems
customer_reviews.author: Jesse sellers

customer_reviews.title: The amp burnt out with in a month
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a kenwood amp 1000 watt I’ve had the items for about 3 months but it has been in my car for a about a month. It will randomly shut off and on. I had the bass and everything set to the lowest settings. I’ve tried to contact the seller but have. Ever heard anything back. I’ve excepted that I will just have to eat this one and buy another from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love kenwood but not this
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why of all kenwood things I've owned this just didn't do the job my new jbl blows this out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Msgt.Z

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood Quality As Usual
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Kenwood mono amp and everyone has performed flawlessly for years of service. Using this one to drive a 10" shallow mount sub in my truck. Handles the duty and never over heats....and it makes my sub THUMP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little amp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and being a bit old school it was hard to believe this little amp with 2 knobs on it could be anywhere near as good as it is. Its happily pounding a 12" JL w0 though. I've been using kenwood electronics for 15 years and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, a little warm if pushed really hard, but highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Just like a lot of others when it came I looked ...
customer_reviews.text: Just like a lot of others when it came I looked at it and was like here we go. But like all other good reviews this little amp rocks my 2 kenwood 12's NP what a great buy for sure. Can't go wrong with the size and power this amp comes in a little package but has one hell of a punch.
customer_reviews.author: WANDO

customer_reviews.title: My son was pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: My son was pleased with this product. He has installed it in his truck and is loving his whole system with the addition of this.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R. Hildreth

customer_reviews.title: BLOWN AFTER LESS THAN A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: Been less than a year, and the amp is already toast. Buy another brand. Easy to install nice and compact to fit under all seats, but blown within LESS THAN A YEAR.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Macik

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality from Kenwood
customer_reviews.text: Bought unit as a x-mas gift. Lasted about 90days running a single 10" bazooka tube and died internally. Power light came on but had no output power to the +/- terminals for the speaker. Expected better quality from Kenwood.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gompf

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ran for a little over a year then amp fried running 2 12's
customer_reviews.author: raleigh spartan

customer_reviews.title: Amp not producing
customer_reviews.text: Amp worked fine for about 6 months then stopped. Shows there is power to the amp. Had a professional check it out and amp is not producing but power supply and speaker wires are all good.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very defective. Worked for a couple weeks but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very defective. Worked for a couple weeks but the ground was putting out 11v. Eventually stopped working and now I can't return it. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Jake Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 10" Sub
customer_reviews.text: Works great paired with a 10" Infinity sub in a 0.40 CF sealed box. Installed in my 02 Silverado 2500HD Crew Cab, under rear drivers seat.
customer_reviews.author: Stark

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great amp. That matched with the kenwood 2000w max 12" sub on here works great togeather
customer_reviews.author: Nathan L.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Great Amp (3 month review)
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING AMP never had a problem yet. I've had my Kenwood 1000wat plugged into my 2 10" JL subs for three ish months. There is no better amp to handle the power for the price, I hope if your looking for real power and feel you pick this Kenwood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood KAC-5001Ps Mono Amp
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact mono amp, fit in small spaces, produce a nice boom.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fred

customer_reviews.title: Dies after six months, twice.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Had two of these die now, just outside the warranty period. Junk. Great, clean sounding amp! Have been a Kenwood fan since my first Kenwood deck and amp nearly 20 years ago. Kenwood still is bringing the best in quality and fidelity. This amp is powering a 600 watt 10" Kicker Comp preloaded shallow sub box. It is providing a perfect match for the sub at around 70% gain, with my Kenwood deck bass settings nearly flat. This gives you the best possible fidelity. Both the deck and sub were also bought here from Amazon. Great little amp!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Bizness

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: matched up perfect with my setup, powers 2 12 inch subs
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great size and power.
customer_reviews.text: Compact size fits in the trunk perfect and when paired with the Kenwood KFC-XW12 - 12 inch 4 Ohm subwoofer it sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wesley Allen

customer_reviews.title: Sounded good until...it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Installed it, it worked great and sounded great... 3 months later on the amp broke When I turn off the amp it makes my sub "pop" It works at low volumes but once you get to a nice listing volume it turns itself off I used to be able to crank this amp and it sounded amazing This is my second one... So I'm not wasting more money on this fragile amp and will be investing in a more high end amp....that has a warranty. Maybe I'm just hard on amps?
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Bury

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: Smooth transition and perfectly powers my Kenwood KFC-XW800F 8" sub
customer_reviews.author: TAC_AUDIO

customer_reviews.title: BASS MONSTER
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried at first but this amp is a great buy. It pushes my 2 fozgate 12" subs with ease. ..tons of bass and I don't even have the bass turned up on my radio...which is factory by the way...the bass bost is also turned down on the amp...my Mazda 6 is a bass beast and all my friends and co-workers ask me what I got in the trunk....no problem yet and it's always cool when I touch the amp...highly recommended by me...
customer_reviews.author: wayne jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little and really pushes my kicker sub. Clean and clear
customer_reviews.author: Donald Swisher

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Light came on as soon as it was juiced. Only got it half way now but will be pushing it soon.
customer_reviews.author: tamijc_09

customer_reviews.title: Components in amp malfunctioned.
customer_reviews.text: The amp worked fine for a month, it was uninstalled and then when it was put back in it no longer sent signal to the speakers. The red light was indicating it did have power. The amp was opened up and there is a cylindrical piece of wrapped copper or something else bronze. It seems that this piece went bad. If you pull up on that object, the speakers start to hit, if you let it go, they stop again. We rigged a rubber band to pull on it and it works now, but this is not an ideal solution and I would like to talk to someone from Kenwood or receive a replacement. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Level 3

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great amp, beats the price at my local best buy($200) it was worth the wait to save the money, this amp does the job, have had it for a month or so and no problems, makes my 15 inch American bass DX loud!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product! been using it for 6 months now with no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: hugotomic

customer_reviews.title: This amp when I saw it and picked it up ...
customer_reviews.text: This amp when I saw it and picked it up I thought I got ripped off it don't weigh much but I was wrong this amp throws a strong punch on my 10" CV's. Two 10" cerwin Vegas
customer_reviews.author: jorge lopez

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my 3 year old Kenwood amp that stopped working. Has absolutely no problem pushing my 2 12's @ 300rms and 800peak. Its never shut off on me either like my old one did with the same subs. I may buy a second when I get a few extra bucks to throw around so I can power each sub independently.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Amp works good. Have it hooked up to an addictive audio ...
customer_reviews.text: Amp works good. Have it hooked up to an addictive audio V1 12" sub. Hits hard hits strong.. but over heats to often.
customer_reviews.author: Blas Aceves

customer_reviews.title: This worked great and its pushing one 12 tremendously and is getting ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and its pushing one 12 tremendously and is getting the job done. My speakers sound great. This is the best amp on amazon. Buy this one!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Small light weight wast of money
customer_reviews.text: Good power but it did not last a year before it fried
customer_reviews.author: George S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing is all I have to say Running a Jl audio w3 w it and it bumpsssss
customer_reviews.author: Eric Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Drop the BASS
customer_reviews.text: This amp hits HARD. I have it connected to my 2 10" Kenwood Subwoofers and they sound great. I went on a road trip and had the amp on for 5 and a half hours, and it never felt like it was over heating. Great amp, great price
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Small Amp, but great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power for small Amp. Great clean sound, my subs sound great!
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this amp in February I think, about a month later this amp will constantly turn off and on after about 10 minutes. I even turned the gain down to see if it would fix the problem, but nope! The only way to keep the amp functioning is too lower the volume on the radio. Then you hardly get any bass from the sub. I guess I should of known better for paying such a cheap price, but i figured it had the Kenwood name, it wouldn't be to bad. I will stick to fosgate like I had a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Big Roc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome amp
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I've had it for close to a month and it keeps exceeding my expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Bad azz amp with the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Amp is great. I have it powering a comp 12 and it pounds hard!!! No problems at all had it hooked up by a professional!!

customer_reviews.title: Super😎
customer_reviews.text: It's Perfect! Not too complicated to install and hook up. Clean look. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got two 12"s an this amp packs it. Great deal.

customer_reviews.title: Good Amp For My 10" Sony
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, Sounds good for my PT Cruiser and 10" sony. It hits like two 12's thanks again sir.
customer_reviews.author: Roush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I needed to give my subs an extra kick. ..
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Meek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Mounted directly to R/T 300 Enclosure Series (314-12) - Single Slot Vented 12-Inch Sub Bass. Installed in 2002 WRX, perfect fit, awesome output.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: I've read a lot of bad reviews on this but as of yet I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: I've read a lot of bad reviews on this but as of yet I've had no problem, definitely packs a punch for its size
customer_reviews.author: Carbonpup

customer_reviews.title: Never worked properly
customer_reviews.text: I hooked this amp up to an Alpine Marine sub that is in my Jeep Wrangler and it never worked properly. It would go into protection mode almost immediately after turning the volume up past 20 (out of 50). I replaced it with the PBR series from Fosgate. The Fosgate never cuts out and it was hooked up using all the same wiring and connections. The ohms were identical. Kenwood is alright but Fosgate has always had the best amps for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: PugetSmith

customer_reviews.title: Yes we all see the cheap price risking the chance these were refurbished or just bad models. Either way I would say NO when ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned this product for 2 months and it completely quit. Ive never had trouble with kenwwod amps before but i no longer will be buying them. Yes we all see the cheap price risking the chance these were refurbished or just bad models. Either way I would say NO when it comes to buying this product. It also had issues cutting out when it did work .
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Great AMP
customer_reviews.text: My system sounds amazing and the install was so easy. It came with everything I needed. The only hard part for me was finding a good ground in my car to hook it up to. You need a good ground!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Marie

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood - all good
customer_reviews.text: It does it job. It pushes my speakers. The bass sounds so good. It feels like I got the nightclub in the backseat.
customer_reviews.author: Tabaris Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just got a bad one but either way I am returning the amp ...
customer_reviews.text: Sending back to Amazon due to it not working properly! Light never turned on and all my wires were checked and double checked. Maybe I just got a bad one but either way I am returning the amp back to amazon!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very nice amp!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and has all the kick my sub requires. I'm very pleased with the amp and am planning to buy another just like it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the amp installed very long however it's been good so far and I received it really quick!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Looks and functions great
customer_reviews.text: I think kenwood did good with this amp, it pushes my subs well and I would recommend it if you want a pretty good amp for a low price. I have it hooked up to my pioneer 12" sub, wired at 2 ohms, and it drives it great. It does get extremely hot if playing music at high levels, and sometimes goes into protection mode because of this. Other than that it works fine, mounted easily on my backseat.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: not happy been a Kenwood amp fan for over 15 years ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Oct 2016 yesterday if fried out and almost started my car on fire... complete amp failure... not happy been a Kenwood amp fan for over 15 years never have had one fry out is there a warranty on this item???
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: "THE BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK"
customer_reviews.text: The Kenwood 1000watts puts out good power to my 10" JLaudio subwoofer. deep bass sound...great buy for the price "$122.00" I highly recommend you to buy it.you won't be disappointed :)
customer_reviews.author: rubin foreman

customer_reviews.title: little amp big sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm all outside my truck with my new kenwood block amp. I Hope I don't get a noise ordinance ticket.
customer_reviews.author: roy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Its just what I needed It makes my 12s hit so hard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, perfectly runs a 400w rms 12" Skar Audio sub. If your sub is no higher than 500w rms, get this. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hooked up to the back of my 400w rms 12" Skar Audio sub for about 2-3 weeks now and it has been powering it perfectly fine with no hiccups. Really shows great quality build as well since it can handle being screwed to the back of a sub box that is kicking some heavy bass that rattles the whole car. I have not noticed any distortion, jumps, skips, nothing, zip, its been running this sub with no problems so I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: The.Average.Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for short term use, not built to last!
customer_reviews.text: The amp was perfect for almost a year! All of a sudden it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great amp
customer_reviews.text: its strong, loud, and looks good. my 10's sound like 12's and the wiring was pretty self explanatory. I would recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: lane

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Must have been a bad amp sent to me. Hooked it up and absolutely nothing
customer_reviews.author: Sean Perone

customer_reviews.title: maybe I was just unlucky with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Went dead after a week. Had it checked out @best buy the amp was dead didn't work.so maybe i'll try again.
customer_reviews.author: jermaine gulley

customer_reviews.title: Workd great for a few months then it fryd
customer_reviews.text: Workd great for a few months then it fryd, fuses fine, light turns immediately off and I need to replace it
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Great amp!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you know what you're doing and have done your homework this amp is awesome. No problems with it at all. At this price it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood is top of the line
customer_reviews.text: I like this amp a lot it power my subs real plus I'm real impress how my system sounds with it
customer_reviews.author: Eric Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Amp is dope
customer_reviews.text: This amp is really good. I was nervous when I ordered it, but it has done nothing but impress me since Ive had it. My car sounds so much better and I know this amp can handle some serious power. Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Sean Parno

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly piece of crap coming from Kenwood and a so called good seller
customer_reviews.text: The amp always ran hot even when only hooked up to a 10in kicker sub. Seemed strange seeing that the amp was 1000 watt. Geek squad mentioned that it may be defective but I thought it was a upsale scheme. Well....after 4-5 weeks of average play.....it will no longer power up. Will update after I get response from seller
customer_reviews.author: Therie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's good!! !! I am currently only running the settings a little bit over half and still sounds pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Huddleson

customer_reviews.title: Not a 1000watt amp.
customer_reviews.text: this amp says its a 1000 watt but in reality is a 300watt amp, the 1000 is the max power it can handle, very shady how they labeled it, amp it's ok id give it 6/10 in quality.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian valero

customer_reviews.title: Which isn't 1000 watts it is 300 so it's an amp for something pretty small or maybe one 10
customer_reviews.text: 1000 watt max power. Which isn't 1000 watts it is 300 so it's an amp for something pretty small or maybe one 10
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rose

customer_reviews.title: nice amp
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my amp yesterday said it was new screws looked to be used, box looked like it was opened several times, and one of my sub wire terminal screws is missing, other than that amp looks nice havent hooked up to hear it yet though will re-write review then...
customer_reviews.author: daniel a.

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhhh 👎
customer_reviews.text: I got this, a subwoofer and a new radio and it's just not what I expected; the lowest setting is super bassy, super embarrassing, it rattles inside the car and if the wrong song plays the outside rattles too. I know it was cheap but I was hoping for better quality. If I could do it again, I'd spend a little more money to get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Waid

customer_reviews.title: Best Amp in This Price Range, Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to power my DVC 2ohm Kicker Comp R 12” subwoofer in a sealed box (wired for 4 ohm load). The amp is very small and easily fit under my passenger seat, very easy to wire and most of all kicks out some serious power. Sounds great with no distortion or overheating even after hours of driving and listening to music. Highly recommended and a superb value for the money. I only give it 4 stars because the amp did not match the photo. It is smaller and has the newer Excelon design on it, but all the specs were the same as the one I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Chulzhanov

customer_reviews.title: this amp pushes them amazingly and is a great product for them since they run 250 rms each
customer_reviews.text: wired these to two pioneer 10" subs. running at 500 watts rms, ran parallel/bridges. this amp pushes them amazingly and is a great product for them since they run 250 rms each. I highly recommend this amplifier for any speaker(s) that rms between 250-750...
customer_reviews.author: adrian pangan

customer_reviews.title: Small amp, it puts out power, but no where near rated watts
customer_reviews.text: This amp is super small, so great for tight spaces. However the rms ratings are a lie, and it will never put out 1000w peak. I sold the amp and bought a more powerful one for my single 8" sundown sub. In sure this amp would work great for someone with cheap subs, or low expectations, but if you are an experienced audio person move on. Expect 300w of clean power at 2ohm, and little at 4.
customer_reviews.author: BigDog

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work continuously
customer_reviews.text: Well it keeps shutting off. Sadly I’ve only just hooked it up a month ago and it worked for a week - I am running one 10” bazooka tune. This should not have an issue pushing it, yet it keeps turning off and on
customer_reviews.author: t.grish

customer_reviews.title: Capacitors always with amps
customer_reviews.text: This amp is sweet. The only reason it isnt working for some people... most likely is there wire guage. This amp can push all my subs. Top notch.. great product.. i always run my amps with capacitors... never had an issue since
customer_reviews.author: Systems

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It completely stopped working after about a year. DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT

customer_reviews.title: Came in the mail, doesn’t even work.
customer_reviews.text: Amp came on same day delivery, unfortunately after I wired everything up all good and everything, it is defective. Wired everything up properly, check grounds, positive sources, everything added up. Except for the amp itself. Too bad I was looking forward to this amp too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McGee Jr

customer_reviews.title: recieved a broken product!!
customer_reviews.text: i waited anxiously for this amp to come in so i could be bumping my 12's. but nope! hooked everything up and it the amp wouldnt even turn on. no red light that indicates the power on and it wouldnt power my subs at all. i checked the fuses and tried 5+ different ground spots as well as power. tried for about 2hours. pretty disappointed, will be returning this product and purchasing a pioneer instead. maybe it was bumped during shipment and broken idk. but i recieved an amp that wouldnt power on.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome entry level amplifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great amplifier for the money and has the Kenwood performance. I have it hooked to a 12in Kenwood sub in port tuned enclosure and it matches my system perfect. It won't rattle the pavement but sound and quality can't be beat for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Holt

customer_reviews.title: bought a cheap BOSS audio amp with good reviews and was sorely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: bought a cheap BOSS audio amp with good reviews and was sorely disappointed. had to buy the Kenwood. AWESOME! should have bought the best first!
customer_reviews.author: Carl E. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Very good amp for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have to revise my previous first impressions of this amp - I think it is every bit as good as my previous Kenwood KAC719. It took me a little bit to dial it in but it sounds real nice through my 12" Alpine Type S.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little anp work's good with my pioneer champion series pro 12
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Amplifier
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 amp for the price. I am powering 2 Kicker Comp 10" subwoofers in a sealed box. With the settings dialed in, this amp hits HARD and maintains a good tone.
customer_reviews.author: The Tech Guru

customer_reviews.title: Ran my 10" at 300rms like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and stylish. Ran my 10" at 300rms like a champ. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: 1manmulisha

customer_reviews.title: Powerful amp.
customer_reviews.text: This Kenwood Amp is very good. My husband bought this for our truck, now I’m not a big bass fan but he loves it and this powers his two ten inch sub-woofers perfectly. IT is so powerful that I can hear it from two blocks away. It even still hits a bit when turned all the way down. It is small enough that it can be hidden easily. It has a matte black finish with a glossy face plate. This was very easy to install and will transfer really easily. It even came with a knob to control the output so you don’t have to get out and adjust it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Amp
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a previous older Kenwood model with this newer equivalent. Smaller in size, brings an end cap, covered with a glossy finish. Works great with my lonely 10" JL sub.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood way to go
customer_reviews.text: It made a huge difference in my truck love it thanks and great job
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Decent Amp, surprised how well it actually works with ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent Amp, surprised how well it actually works with my Rockford Fosgate P3, hits very hard in this combo, however when turned up moderatly can only hit for 5 or so songs without starting to cutout from too much bass.
customer_reviews.author: Username

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Connected this item to four 6.5 inch two way kicker speaks and two 10 inch kicker comp series subs and it works very well. The amp is very powerful and is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: calvin A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome amp for my sub!
customer_reviews.text: Very clean power. I have this powering a Kicker L3 Solobaric Sub. I am very happy with the quality of this amp. I have owned a lot of amps and this is the most clean sounding power that I've heard from a sub amp at this price range. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for one subwoofer, tune it right and youll be set
customer_reviews.author: Emad

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even had it a year and it's already giving me problems.
customer_reviews.author: Justin
